text: Yesli zhe sredi vas yest' takiye litsemery, otstranis' ot nikh i srazhaysya (o Mukhammad!) na puti Allakha i Yego Istiny. Ty otvechayesh' tol'ko za sebya. Vmenyay tol'ko samomu sebe obyazannost' srazheniya. Pobuzhday k etomu blagochestivykh veruyushchikh. Mozhet byt', Allakh otrazit i uderzhit yarost' neveruyushchikh. Ved' Allakh - tvoy storonnik i storonnik veruyushchikh! Poistine, Allakh - sil'neyshiy v Svoyey yarosti i sil'neyshiy v Svoyom nakazanii nevernykh
